title: Wave, Naver’s smart speaker, needs work
text: Naver’s Wave [NAVER] GS Caltex achieves Korea's first third-party carbon footprint verification HD Hyundai's Q3 operating profit sinks over reduced operating days SK Innovation to restore mangrove forests in Fiji Lunit joins 'Saudi Vision 2030 Healthcare Initiative' with AI tech Merck to invest $632 million in Korea by 2025 Bang Shin-sil takes the crown at Dongbu Construction Koreit Championship Seoul to add over 2,500 public trash bins by 2025 Secondhand selling boom fuels convenience store delivery services Stocks open lower as earnings season approaches The price of words is not cheap To write comments, please log in to one of the accounts.
